title: Sparky2022
author: Sparky2022
content: I'm setting up a new miner,it has 6- Nvidia 3060Ti founders Edition GPU's. I'm waiting for my last GPU to get to my house. After I have all the hardware installed I will need to download the wallet for the coin I'm mining. I want to use my ledger X if thats possible but not sure. once I pick a coin I cn download everything I need to stat mining. I'm not sure what coin I should mine,definitely not Bitcoin but I was thinking about Monero.Monero has a mining pool that is not the regular style minimg pools. I heard Ravencoin ,vertcoin ,bitcoin ,grin ,haven protocol (XHV) , bitcoin gold ,dogecoin ,Zcash ,etc.... Just not sure which one would be the best for ease to mine for a beginner and which coin would be the most profitable? Amy help would be greatly appreciated. if there is another coin that is easy and profitable I am open to any suggestions. Thank you very much!!!

comments.author: bitbollo
comments.body: The best coin to mine? This can change, it's not something "standard" during time because there are several factors to be taking in account.https://whattomine.com/I find very useful this website that show clear "what to mine". You can set up your miner/expense and so on and get data for your specific situation.

comments.body: For me I had 2GPU which I used to mine Ethereum, but after Ethereum mining stopped I moved to ETC, BTG mining.I think ETC is the best option after ETH but maybe this varies by GPU specification.

comments.author: Tytanowy Janusz
comments.body: you made an investment of at least $3000 and you didn't even check what you will be mining? You probably haven't checked the profitability either and you probably don't even know what the price of electricity is at home? It probably couldn't have been worse. Most of the coins you listed are not even mined with gpu (only ascic). In 2022 there was a merge on eth (POW to POS) and thus the entire GPU that was mining ETH (90% of all GPUs) for a last year desperately looking for a use. The market is probably saturated by now. By checking https://whattomine.com/ and pasting my local electricity prices, I lose money on every coin.
